name: REM (CoconutBun)
description:
REM is a Yume Nikki Fan Game created for the Dream Diary Jam 3

It's very early in development so expect a few missing features and some bugs

How To Play

Sleep in the bed to start dreaming

Explore the Dream World and find Effects

Wake up to return to the bedroom in order to save and exit the game

Controls

Movement = WASD

Interact = E

Use Effect = Shift

Effect Menu = Space

Wake Up = Q

Toggle Fullscreen = F
